name: StarRupture
author: brainshead@gmail.com
description: StarRupture is a first-person open world base-building game with advanced combat and tons of exploration. Play alone or in a group on this sublime and ever-changing planet, extract and manage resources, create your complex industrial system and fight off hordes of alien monsters.
startup: cd /home/container/StarRupture/Binaries/Win64; wine ./StarRuptureServerEOS-Win64-Shipping.exe  -Log -Port=${SERVER_PORT} & SR_PID=$!; tail -c0 -F /home/container/StarRupture/Saved/Logs/StarRupture.log --pid=$SR_PID | grep -v -E "LogCore: Warning|LogUObjectBase: Error"

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# steamcmd Base Installation Script


## just in case someone removed the defaults.
if [ "${STEAM_USER}" == "" ]; then
    echo -e "steam user is not set.\n"
    echo -e "Using anonymous user.\n"
    STEAM_USER=anonymous
    STEAM_PASS=""
    STEAM_AUTH=""
else
    echo -e "user set to ${STEAM_USER}"
fi

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## install game using steamcmd

./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir /mnt/server +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAID} ]] || printf %s "-beta ${SRCDS_BETAID}" ) $( [[ -z ${SRCDS_BETAPASS} ]] || printf %s "-betapassword ${SRCDS_BETAPASS}" ) ${INSTALL_FLAGS} validate +quit ## other flags may be needed depending on install. looking at you cs 1.6

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

#Custom Commands


echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"

variables.name: [STEAM] Steam User
variables.description: This is a required setting and cannot be set to anonymous.

variables.name: [STEAM] Game ID
variables.description: The ID corresponding to the game to download and run using SRCDS

variables.name: [STEAM] Steam Auth
variables.description: Steam account auth code. Required if you have 2fa enabled

variables.name: [STEAM] Auto Update Server
variables.description: This is to auto-update the game server

variables.name: [SYSTEM] WINEPREFIX
variables.description: Wine root directory for the container
